price: Saa na εteε, efirisε, wͻko tia Nyankopͻn ne Ne somafoͻ, na obiara a ͻko tia Nyankopͻn ne Ne somafoͻ no deε nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn awerεtͻ ano yε den papaapa.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum shāqqū al-laha warasūlahu waman yushāqiqi al-laha warasūlahu fa-inna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
